name: Breathe With Me
description:
A little game about relaxing yourself. Take your time, breath, relax and go in peace. 

Controls:      

                          Space Down to Inhales-------Space Up to Exhales------Esc to Exit

This project is a homework, we have to create a game about a feeling. My feeling is Peace. The game comes out of necessity, I'm a nervous person who needs to relax sometimes to feel good and always need exercises and applications, and I think to create my own. Thanks for playing and reading, you're nice people.
